column4: Is there a way to hide file extensions in Nautilus in Feisty or Gutsy? I think I remember it used to do that by default and I always turned it off, but now I can't find the option anywhere. Now that I want it back on, of course. :)
never ever heard of that one
if it's a gnome session aware apps, you can change it's style to restart in system->prefs->session
